Test Cases: Manager/ Customer can check the customer balance enquiry after entering valid account number
Expected Result: Manager/ Customer successfully can view the customer balance enquiry successfully

Test Cases: Manager can't view customer balance enquiry not associated to him
Test Steps: 1) Enter a customer account no. is associated to the manager
Test Data: Accounts No. associated to the manager
Expected Result: An error message "Account does not exist" must shown

Test Cases: Customer can't view customer balance enquiry not associated to him
Test Steps: 1) Enter a customer account no. is not associated to the customer
Expected Result: An error message "Account does not exist" must shown

Test Cases: Customer can view customer balance enquiry associated to him
Test Steps: 1) Enter a customer account no. is associated to the customer
Test Data: Accounts No. associated to the customer
Expected Result: Customer can successfully view customer balance enquiry
